title: Senior iOS/macOS/watchOS/Cross-Platform Developer - Find My client team
summary: The Find My Team deeply cares about helping you keep track of the things that you deeply care about. We are a group of highly motivated engineers building innovative solutions to help you find your devices, items, and friends. In iOS 17, we shipped Precision Finding for people, which is the best way to interact and meet up with your friends! We are seeking passionate developers to help us bring together and create scalable technologies which are used daily by hundreds of millions of people. Join us and help craft new app platforms and technologies that are foundational to Apple’s growing ecosystem.
description: As a member of our team, you’ll be a core creator, contributor, and inventor. You’ll build new infrastructure and features from our healthy roadmap, make steady improvements to our existing foundations, and build out new ideas and innovations. You’ll leverage existing technologies, fill in the gaps with innovation and creativity, and build beautiful user interfaces that are backed by powerful frameworks and daemons. The ideal candidate is proactive, results-driven, and passionate about learning. You will not only dive deep in solving complex problems, but you will also work closely with partners in various disciplines across the company, including SW, HW, Design, Privacy and more. Join our team of individuals with a deep passion for building phenomenal products- we can’t wait to meet you!
preferred_qualifications: BS or MS in Computer Science or a related degree is desired. Candidates with equivalent experience will also be considered.
